question: Identify the option showing the correct labelling for p, q, r and s with reference to the conducting system of the human heart.
images/a5fdc873-1f19-455b-8016-56360c41041c.png
choices: p-Bundle of His, q-SAN, r-Interventicular septum, s-AVN
p-SAN, q-AVN, r-Bundle of His, s-Interventicular septum
p-Interventicular septm, q-AVN, r-Bundle of His, s-SAN
p-AVN, q-SAN, r-Interventicular septum, s-Bundle of His
explanation: p points to the Sino-atrial node (SAN) in the right atrium.
q points to the Atrio-ventricular node (AVN) near the septum.
r points to the Bundle of His branching down the septum.
s refers to the structures in the ventricular wall/septum (Purkinje/Septum).
